short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ThreadLive features inside your Gmail (Early Release)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Gmail EASY button for people who transact business in email.

Free up 2-4 hours per week by having important emails organized, linkable, and accessible in one place.

With ThreadLive, you can:

锔 Create a thread that records all present and future email messages into a thread in ThreadLive.

 Each thread has a unique URL that can be pasted anywhere you need it, so you can connect important conversations to the business applications you already use.

 Group threads into projects for quick access to information scattered across multiple emails.

 Stay organized with a dedicated note for every thread and project, where you can track important details and action items. Increase team productivity through real-time collaboration by sharing notes with your team mates.

 Keep everyone in the loop by securely sharing access to thread messages.

  ThreadLive automatically adds labels to Gmail so you have an organized inbox with little effort.

Focus on your business, not inbox administration.

Install ThreadLive today and start saving time and improving your productivity!

Features:
路 Create and manage threads
路 Share threads with others
路 Add notes to threads
路 Link threads to other applications
路 Automatically add labels to Gmail
路 Organize your inbox
路 Improve your productivity

Benefits:
路 Save time
路 Improve productivity
路 Stay organized
路 Collaborate with others
路 Connect conversations to other applications
路 Have a more organized inbox

Try ThreadLive today and see for yourself how it can help you save time and improve your productivity!
